    void
    add(Node item)
    By default, when adding, we assume user wants to add to the end of the list, so we call addLast method. We also have a special case if it is first item in the list, we call addFirst method

    • add

      public void add(Node item)
      By default, when adding, we assume user wants to add to the end of the list, so we call addLast method. We also have a special case if it is first item in the list, we call addFirst method
